additionalData.message: Could not render Mail-Template with error message: Failed rendering string template using Twig: Variable "parent" does not exist in "b37be941d75a09f298e815e1a9571ce8" at line 4.
additionalData.template:
Hello {{ customer.firstName }} {{ customer.lastname }},

to get access to {{ parent.firstName }} {{ parent.lastName }}'s account ({{ parent.customerNumber }}) we have created your login.

Your customer number: {{ customer.customerNumber }}
Your mail: {{ customer.email }}
Your password: {{ password }}
